question: Which Indian company signed an MoU with the Indian Army for constructing a modular steel bridge in Arunachal Pradesh?
What is the purpose of the MoU to be signed between the National Minorities Development and Finance Corporation (NMDFC) and the Dalit Indian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (DICCI)?
options: To promote digital literacy among marginalized communities
To empower marginalized communities through entrepreneurship
To provide financial aid for education
To support healthcare initiatives for marginalized groups

question: Which organization signed an agreement with Silizium Circuits Pvt Ltd for the "Design and Development of LEO Satellite Components and GNSS RF Front End ASIC"?
What is the capital of Nicaragua, where India and Nicaragua recently signed an MoU for Quick Impact Projects?
Which organization signed an MoU with REMC Limited to explore financing options for power projects for Railways?
Which state signed MoUs worth ₹38,750 crore at the World Economic Forum in Davos?
Which state government signed an MoU with the Swiss-Indian Chamber of Commerce to foster international business collaboration during the Global Investors 2025?
Which two ministries signed an MoU to enhance geriatric healthcare and tackle substance abuse?
options: Ministry of Health & Ministry of Ayush
Ministry of Ayush & Department of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry of Women & Child Development & Ministry of Ayush
Ministry of Home Affairs & Ministry of Ayush
Ministry of Women & Child Development & Ministry of Health
answer: Ministry of Ayush & Department of Social Justice and Empowerment

question: Which defense system is being collaborated on between Swedish defense firm Saab and Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) as per their recent MoU?
Which state signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the State Bank of India (SBI) and Union Bank of India (UBI) to offer insurance benefits to its government employees on January 1, 2025?
With which organization did the Financial Intelligence Unit-India (FIU-IND) sign an MoU on January 6, 2025, to enhance cooperation in combating money laundering?
options: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI)
Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI)
answer: Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI)
